name: Egenera
overview: Egenera, Inc. designs, develops, and delivers infrastructure orchestration solutions to enterprises, service providers, and government agencies in the United States and internationally. The companyâ€™s products include PAN Manager, an infrastructure management and orchestration software; Egenera BladeFrame, a system that combines stateless servers and PAN Manager software; Dell PAN System, a pre-configured system, which includes Dell servers and PAN Manager software; and operating systems. Its products also include PAN Builder software that offers PAN Manager features to configure, control, and monitor infrastructure resources; PAN Server Portability software, which provides failover capability that automatically moves an application service from a failed server to a recovery server; and PAN Portability software that moves applications running on a PAN system to a backup PAN system residing in a remote data center. In addition, the company offers enterprise software and hardware support options that include software and hardware installation, parts, and remote system monitoring services; and consulting, knowledge transfer, and technical support services, as well as educational courses. It serves companies in various industries, including eCommerce, financial services, government, healthcare, ISP/hosting, non-profit, telecommunications, and public sector. The company was formerly known as Newheading, Inc. and changed its name to Egenera, Inc. in August 2000. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Marlborough, Massachusetts.

relationships.title: Executive Vice President of Operations and Worldwide Services

funding_rounds.source_description: Egenera lands $2M from debt, equity sale
Egenera Raises $26 Million in Series E Funding

milestones.description: expected to announce numbers for 2010, in which it is reporting 200 percent year-over-year growth in the all-software business that is now its focus
